feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.2: Fix - Make theme selection case insensitive
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Downcase theme selection (#2921) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.12.1 to 1.12.2 (#2920) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump logger from 1.6.3 to 1.6.4 (#2918) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erubi from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 (#2917) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.50.2

..and go to http://localhost:5100

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.3: Theme Bug Fix & Latest Language Strings
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Cyborg Theme: Upstream Bootswatch Fix (#2942) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Translation Strings (#2943) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump importmap-rails from 2.0.3 to 2.1.0 (#2926) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.6: Fix Preliminary Double Loading
entry.content:
This releases fixes an issue where under some circumstances, the "Click Here to Proceed" link was being pre-loaded via Javascript optimization and burning up a view.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Block preliminary pre-loading (#2993) @pglombardo
  • Tools: New Docker release tagging script (#2989) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby from 3.3-alpine to 3.4-alpine in /containers/docker (#2944) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump parser from 3.3.6.0 to 3.3.7.0 (#2992) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1038.0 to 1.1039.0 (#2991) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.10.0 to 6.11.0 (#2990) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-performance from 1.23.0 to 1.23.1 (#2957) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.177.0 to 1.178.0 (#2987) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.215.1 to 3.216.0 (#2986) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-core from 0.15.1 to 0.16.0 (#2985) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump concurrent-ruby from 1.3.4 to 1.3.5 (#2984) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.96.0 to 1.97.0 (#2983) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version
